colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS ZHES SOGS DANG, RLUNG RTA GSO BA'I BSANGS GSOL MCHOD RLUNG RTA ME 'BAR BA'I RLUNG GA-YAB CES BYA BA 'DI NI MTHO RIGS THOS PA TSANG SPYOD LDAN THO YON RAB BRTAN CES BYA BA 'DI NI LTAR DGOS ZHES GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DGE SLONG GI MING CAN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES BYA BA'I BAG CHAGS BZHAG NAS BRIS PA SEMS DGE BAS PHYI MAR SKYE BA MANG SNA TSOGS THABS KYIS 'GRO BA'I DON MDZAD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
